title: What are the most heroic and iconic American battles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Revolutionary War: Lexington and Concord, Bunker Hill, Saratoga, Yorktown War of 1812: Fort McHenry, Bladensburg Mexican War: Chapultepec/Mexico City Civil War: Fort Sumpter, First Bull Run, Gettysburg, Shiloh, Vicksburg, Appomattox Plains Indian Wars: Fetterman Massacre, Wagon Box Fight, Little Big Horn, Wounded Knee Spanish War: San Juan Hill, Manila Bay, Guantanamo WWI: Belleau Wood, Meuse-Argonne WWII: Pearl Harbor, Guadalcanal, Midway, Iwo Jima, Anzio, D-Day, Bastogne, Market-Garden, Kasserine Korea: Pusan Perimeter, Inchon, Chosin Reservoir Vietnam: Ia Drang Valley, Hue, Khe Sahn, Fall of Saigon, Hamburger Hill Gulf War: Medina Ridge, 73 Easting Other Notable Battles: Fallen Timbers, Tippecanoe, Siege of Peking, Grenada, Beirut, Mogadishu, Panama

Bunker Hill, Yorktown (American Revolution) Gettysburg, and Shiloh (Civil War) Belleau Wood, Meuse-Argonne offensive (WW1) Tunis Pass, Operation Husky, D-Day, Battle of the bulge, Wake Island, Iwo Jima, Okinawa (WW2) The more recent ones aren’t very interesting to me, but these are the ones that interest me the most.
